name: Road Construction Town Builder: Dump Truck Driver
name_original: Road Construction Town Builder: Dump Truck Driver
description:
A new city is under construction and the job for the road builder is up for grabs. Road Construction Town Builder allows you to step into the shoes of a construction contractor. You get to operate various heavy construction vehicles, road building equipment and drive them around the site while completing different road builder tasks.

Road Construction Town Builder is your chance to feel like a part of city construction crew. Road construction is a multiple step process and it will let you have a slice of the action involved in all these steps. Road building process often starts with the removal of earth and rock by digging and excavation and is followed by the laying of pavement material. Construction site work is a tough grind and is not for the faint hearted. Are you willing to take this uphill battle in this ultimate construction simulator game and help lay the infrastructure for this new city.

Gameplay:
You have been given control over various construction machines in this game. You get to drive multiple heavy vehicles like a sand excavator and a road roller in this one game. So, get ready to take on these mighty machines.

First, you will sit behind the steering of an excavator crane . Pick up your road builder material with your heavy excavator and drop it into the dump truck. You will handle the heavy excavator manually using the steering and other controllers. The heavy excavator haulage is equipped with hydraulic controls that will help you dig out the road debris with precision. The excavator digger includes all hydraulic operations : planetary, winch, elevation, rotation and extension. Use them to your advantage, and experience easy maneuvering of steering controls to build road architecture as quickly as possible.
Next step is to use the automatic switch control to drive your dumper truck to the desired location on the construction site where you will unload the road building material. Drive carefully over the rough terrain and keep your vehicle safe.

Now, it's time to bring the giant road roller into action. It is a compactor type vehicle used to compact soil, gravel, concrete and asphalt. Get behind the driving wheels and drive your road roller to compress out the building material.

This city construction simulator game combines the adventure of different games like road roller simulator and crane operator simulator together and is a dream come true for all the road builder simulator lovers. As far as heavy equipment games go, this is one of a kind. So, what are you waiting for? Get ready to put your road building equipment operating skills to test in this game. Roll up your sleeves , take the steering wheel of your heavy duty construction machines and get to the business of building some roads.
